int dispatch_from_args ( int  argc,
char **  argv 
)

Configuration is read from config file and right methods dispatched based on arguments given to file.

void do_run ( void   ) 

This method fork's child process as daemon to continue the work and exits. Also pid file with child's pid is created. If pid file already exists, method prints warning and exits doing nothing.

int eradicate ( const char *  filename  ) 

Kills process with pid written to file.

Parameters:
filename name of the file where the pid is written

Szajt

const char* read_conf ( const char *  filename  ) 

Using libconfig a config file is parsed and options are extracted to global struct aids_conf. If config file is malformed a description of the error is returned.

Parameters:
filename name of config file
Returns:
description of error in case of failure or NULL if everything goes ok
